ygData.subject: Re: Skull staff quest
ygData.msgSnippet: furthermore, unfortunately for Khaldron, the staff of writhing is only usable by ENC MAG NEC WIZ and BRD. Shada Silverleaf, Level 40 Bard, Mithaniel Marr ...
ygData.messageBody:
furthermore, unfortunately for Khaldron, the staff of writhing is only
usable by ENC MAG NEC WIZ and BRD.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 40 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


-----Original Message-----
From: Magis [mailto:Magis@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 29, 1999 6:18 AM
To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] Skull staff quest


From: Magis <Magis@...>

Dark Elf wrote:

> From: Dark Elf <darkelf18@...>
>
> All I know is this. During Beta, someone was running around with a
> staff like the one the priest of discord carries. When asked about it,
> h said it was a combination of the skull of whosamawhatsit (sp?) and
> the runed totem staff. Anyone heard of this quest? It is supposed to
> be an awsome staff. The skull in itself is pretty cool, but I really
> want the look of that staff. DOesn't it just seem like the perfect
> thing for a Dark elf cleric to haul around with him?
>
> Khaldron Val'Lagor
> Priest of Innoruk
> _________________________________________________________
> Do You Yahoo!?
> Get your free @... address at http://mail.yahoo.com
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Give back to your community through "Grow to Give."
> http://www.ONElist.com
> See homepage for details.

No .. You cannot Combine the Skull and Staff , The staff it Does exist is
call ed a Staff of Withering , 9 dam 33 delay , Random 45 dam Chaotic
Feedback, One handed blunt ( don't worry casters about your skill Its a
level 40 + item so You don't want to be in melee at that time)


--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage
